mapper.select: SELECT sv.`value`,p.product_code FROM sku_property sp INNER JOIN sku s ON (s.sku_id = sp.sku_id) INNER JOIN product_sku_property_value sv ON (sv.product_sku_property_value_id = sp.product_sku_property_value_id) INNER JOIN product_sku_property_key sk ON (sk.product_sku_property_key_id = sp.product_sku_property_key_id) INNER JOIN product p ON(s.product_id = p.product_id) where s.sku_code=#{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
